bibl.title: Medical Officer's quarters, Camp Columbia, Havana, Cuba, [n.d.]

div1.head: Medical Officer's quarters, Camp Columbia, Havana, Cuba, [n.d.]
div1.p:
MEDICAL OFFICERS' QUARTERS, POST HOSPITAL, U.S.A., COLUMBIA BARRACKS, (HAVANA).
Officers mess
Where Dr. &
Mrs. Lazear & others ate
N
To sea
AC
MR
After 2 years searching I found this in one of the
Reports of the Gov. General of Cuba.
The YF Bd met on the north porch (other side of photo)
of the officer's quarters porch
The medical officers mess is on st left
I think the women took turns running it
& I think Mrs Lazear took her turn
awhile (before she went to States)
Lazear probably innoculated Carroll in his quarters
here (or might have had him come over to the nearby lab
just to right of this photo
DR. PHILIP S. HENCH
MAYO CLINIC
ROCHESTER, MINN.
